Test Name: Histoplasma and Blastomyces Antigen, Enzyme Immunoassay (Urine)
Purpose: To detect Histoplasma and Blastomyces antigens in urine using an enzyme immunoassay.
Container: BD Vacutainer Urinalysis Preservative Conical Urine tube
Equipment: EIA plate reader, multichannel pipette, incubator, plate washer
